dsOverview.title: U.S.A.F. Global 1-Degree and 5-Minute Average Elevation Data

summary.p: This free dataset contains average elevation data at 1-degree resolution for the globe, and at 5-minute resolution for Europe, parts of North Africa, and most of North America.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOD/NGA > National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency, U. S. Department of Defense
contributor.formerName: Air Force Aeronautical Chart and Information Center

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Land Surface > Topography > Terrain Elevation
